body.p: The pricing of AirClassroom is going to be hourly. There are, however, discounts if groups or individuals use AirClassroom for more than one day.

The pricing is as follows:
$50/hour if using only one day
$40/hour if using for two days
$35/hour if using for more than two days
These fees include your deposit, the restroom amenities in Shanks Hall, several water fountains, the technology provided by Virginia Tech, and the marketing of events throughout campus.
